name: ChronoTeller
description:
ChronoTeller

Escape the Labyrinth! Draw cards and use them to make your move across the board and defeat enemies. Utilize time manipulating cards to get the jump on your foes in this strategic card battler.

ControlsMovement cardClick and drag movement cardAttack cardClick and drag attack card
Cancel Action[Esc]Time reverse cardClick and drag time reverse card
and then press space to confirm
and move enemy back
Credits

Code: Max Campbell

Game Design: LehanDesigns

Art: HaywireJo

Audio: Orbenism
